data.name: The Monster Under Your Skin
data.detailed_description:
Play as a nameless man who suspects his wife of something, and get lost into his perception of that day when he was about to propose to her. Your choices can influence the the plot, but this does not mean that you should play the "knight on a white horse" just for the sake of a "good ending".

Genre: thriller with some elements of romance.

What could you expect in this adventure?


A suspenseful story about a man who suspects his wife Irma of something strange. The protagonist won't easily admit what exactly his suspicions are, and you'll have to find out for yourself.

You will be able to relive snippets of this man's memories and even change them with your own decisions.

The ending of the game will surely surprise you, because no matter what you suspect the main character or his wife of... You're most likely wrong.

Game features


Read the text. Press the 'Continue' button. At the plot branches, use your mouse to choose action and answer options for the protagonist and his wife. Enjoy the 3D scenes on the right side of the screen.

It's really simple.

Although... Wait a minute! Very often the game will give you options for actions and answers that depend on your previous decisions in the story.

And sometimes... Sometimes some of the events in the game will depend on your luck and, again, on your previous choices.

Oh, yes! It's also worth mentioning that the action and answer choices here are not like Yes-No-Sarcasm.

The story adjusts to your choices, but that doesn't mean you should only choose the "positive" options to get a "better" ending. Be yourself.

The game has no saves, "text rewinds" or other simplifications. This adventure needs your one free evening and all your attention.

Some statistics


What is the "The Monster Under Your Skin" made of:

    🟣 game duration is from 30 to about 60 minutes (the duration will depend on what choices you will be making during the game. Well, and on your reading speed, of course);

    🟣 text and dialogues for a total of 80-100 pages, with a lot of answer options;

    🟣 plot that is a mixture of thriller, romance and "secret ingredient";

    🟣 two mini-games that depend on your luck and your previous choices in the game.
